title: Hollyoaks' Daisy Wood-Davis and Luke Jerdy hit the red carpet together after getting engaged
text:

Hollyoaks ' Daisy Wood-Davis and Luke Jerdy walked the red carpet together at the Inside Soap Awards looking very happily engaged.

Luke proposed to his girlfriend Daisy while on holiday in Greece in August, unveiling the news on Instagram where Daisy showed off her gorgeous engagement ring designed by Luke.

The couple appeared together at the ceremony, held at Sway in London on Monday evening, smiling away for the cameras as they watched the C4 show scoop Best Soap.

Daisy donned a bold dogtooth print jumpsuit and nude boots while her fiancé opted for a suave look in a polo neck jumper, a blue jacket and grey trousers and no socks with his boat shoes.

(Image: Getty Images)

Daisy, 28, and Luke, 29, looked very well put together considering they had just hosted their engagement party the night before.

The couple documented their evening with their family and friends revealing all the details that had gone in to planning the bash.

In one snap from the party, Daisy, who played Kim Butterfield in Hollyoaks between 2014 and 2018, laughed away next to Luke in front of a wall of balloons.

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

(Image: PA)

She shared the image on her Instagram writing: "We have woken up horrendously hungover from the most amazing party celebrating our engagement with some of our nearest & dearest..

"Looking forward to a lifetime of laughter (preferably always in front of an @upupawayevents balloon arch but you can’t have it all can you?!)"

Luke, who plays Jesse Donovan in the C4 soap, echoed his fiancées feelings.

Posting a picture of him kissing a four-tiered cake he wrote: "Just wanting to thank @bespokebellacakes for sponsoring my hangover today. 4 layers of chocolate heaven, for our engagement cake-wish I could make this part of the #livefreshplan."

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

Luke popped the question during a romantic gathering on the beach in the summer, where their special moment was witnessed by Daisy's family.

He presented Daisy with an Alex Monroe band featuring intricate gold flowers entwined around a circular diamond, emerald and tanzanite stones, which he had designed himself.

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

Daisy wrote of the news in her own post: "On Thursday evening @lukejerdy asked me to marry him by the beach in front of my family.

"I've never felt a happiness like this. It’s so surreal but nothing has ever felt more natural. I can’t wait to marry my best friend and celebrate how lucky we are to have found what we have. Not to mention, he designed me the engagement ring of my DREAMS.

"I have spent the last few days staring lovingly at him and the ring in equal measure (maybe more the ring) Let the celebrations commence!"
description: The happy Hollyoaks couple celebrated their recent engagement with a huge party the night before the Inside Soap Awards
